dict.acceptation: 秘书；干事，书记员； 部长，大臣；

sent.orig: UN Secretary-Generalthe next Secretary-General to succeed Kofi Annan at an oath of office ceremony on Thursday.
sent.trans: 星期三即将接任克菲。安南任联合国秘书长的番基文在联合国总部进行了就职宣誓仪式。

sent.orig: Now both the secretary and the secretary of state chair the meetings, with their Chinese counterparts.
sent.trans: 目前由美国财长和国务卿与中国同级别官员共同主持相关会议。

sent.orig: Li Fenglin chancellor and chief secretary, Zhang Yi-min, as secretary-cum-scriptwriter.
sent.trans: 李枫林任校长兼书记，张依民任秘书兼编剧。

sent.orig: Secretary professional is one of focus and difficult issues in the secretary field Theresearchtheofand contrast.
sent.trans: 秘书职业化是目前秘书学界的热点和难点问题之一。

sent.orig: Term Supreme People's Court in 1997, party secretary, secretary of the CPC Central PoliticalLegal Committee.
sent.trans: 1997年任最高人民法院院长、党组书记，中共中央政法委员会书记。
